idea:
Real estate as an asset class, until recently has been traditionally looked upon as one of the preferred choices for investors. With sole reliance on capital appreciation no large effort has been made to utilize the rental potential of the asset. Meanwhile in a growing economy people migrate to places and they are in search for a house. Housing remains a basic need and it can be sufficed in many forms. While the aspirations of our core working population has increased multi-fold, the rental industry has failed to evolve with time. The home seekers still settle for what they think is the best solution but what they are getting is very mediocre to what they deserve.

DOMA is envisioned to be the most disruptive innovation in the real estate space which will unlock potential of the real estate asset and re-define the ‘way of life’ for consumers and owners.
name: MultiLiving Technologies Pvt Ltd

idea:
Psychologia Connect is a Web based service providing platform for 4 Major Sectors & Therapies in Psychology.
They are as follows:
Corporate/Industrial Psychology
Clinical Psychology
Counselling Psychology
Sports Psychology
Therapies
We connect users to our verified experts that include psychologists, life coaches, sex therapist, counsellors, social workers, speech and occupational therapists, marriage and family therapists and psychiatrists, nutritionist and many more with different areas of expertise. Psychologia Connect will shape you in willingly accepting the unique challenges of life.

We conduct seminars workshops events for awareness on various topics
name: PSYCHOLOGIA CONNECT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Introduction: We are Squad Six Business Pvt Ltd, incorporated on 28th March, 2019 at Mumbai.

Business Model: Start-up - Squad Six Business model in Health-Care & Wellness

Our Hybrid Business Model, will be in Health Tech & Med Tech space. Our Innovative Mobile App platform will function as hyper local pharmacy market place aggregation for B2C, customers and consumers which brings the retail medical shops / Pharmacies also we are connecting with Pharma Distributors...By consolidating all these niches and independent local retailers & Distributors, we will consolidate multiple purchase occasions into just one. Simplifying the process for the end Consumer or Medicine buyer.

Using our app, customers will be able to upload the Doctor's prescription and order from their nearest & favorite medical shops and our USP - Unique Selling Proposition of our Start-up will be the Fastest Medicines Delivery, which will be delivered within 60 to 90 minutes. In this way, we are trying to solve the problem of Urgent need of Medicine for Customers / Consumers...Also Pharmacy retailers will get more business and end users will get the medicines at their Door step Convenience. our strategy is to connect the Customers via our mobile App with the local Retail pharmacy shops & Pharma Distributors and give express delivery to Consumers through our In-house Fleet force, Delivery Riders and also with the help of Retail Pharmacies - own Staffs, Simultaneously we are achieving this Successful delivery by partnering with external Last mile logistics players...

In Future we have a biggest Vision to become a 360* Holistic Health & Wellness brand for the end Customers & Consumers... We are planning to bring lot more Health Care Services & Wellness Products in our Business Model which will be sold via our Mobile App to Customers & Consumers.
name: SQUAD SIX BUSINESS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Brandintelle Services Private Limited www.brandintelle.com
Purpose
Our objective is to reduce the need for marketing course corrections. For this, marketing managers must have access to deep insights, based on real time marketing analytics.
We achieve this in 2 steps:
1. real time process automation for all marketing activities. 
2. integrate real time marketing & business insights into the automated process.
In this manner, marketing decisions require minimum course corrections.

Unique Approach
 The uniqueness of our solution which is addressed to large marketers is that it combines real time process automation with real time reporting dashboards along with real time, deep insights which are derived from a persistent marketing analytics platform. We help set up & manage the process automation as well as the persistent Marketing Analytics platform.

Ultimate Goal
We plan plough back the deep insights into the automated marketing processes, so that marketing managers may take decisions with the advantage of real time marketing road maps.
name: BRANDINTELLE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
